name: PUBG – Supply Pack: SEASON 4
description:
Buy the PUBG-Supply Pack : Season 4 to earn G-coin and explore the Battlegrounds like never before with

PUBG – Supply Pack : SEASON 4 Content:
- 1600 G-Coin
- Cheerleader Skins set
: Shako Cheerleader Hat
: Cheerleader Sweater
: Cheerleader Skirt
: Cheerleader Sneakers

• This product is available for purchase for a limited time from Aug 27, 2019 (01:00 PDT) to Oct 21, 2019 (01:00 PDT).
• Cheerleader skins set is an exclusive skin set only available through the PUBG - Supply Pack: Season 4

• Please visit the official website (https://pass.pubg.com) for more information for PUBG Season 4

Network Players 2-99 - Full game requires PlayStation®Plus membership to access online multiplayer
25GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
Online Play (Required)
